monsterSpeed: Speed 40 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 40' ft.
monsterSpecials: Detect Invisibility. Within 50 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight
Keen Smell. The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
Poison Sense. The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.
monsterActions: Claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
